detail_desc: Metal earrings decorated with a polished stone and round pendants made from metal and paper straw.
Short, sleeveless top in soft jersey with a draped wrapover detail at the hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with ties at the front, and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sandals in canvas with a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and imitation cork wedge heels. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.

Padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zipped chest pocket, side pockets with a press-stud, a loose yoke at the back with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and imitation leather details. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
Long earrings in metal and fabric with tassels. Length 14.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Wide shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back with a raw-edge lace trim .
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shopper in paper straw with two imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 17 cm. Height 38 cm. Width 38 cm.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for larger bust and a fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long, sleeveless dress in patterned chiffon with a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the back. V-neck front and back and a wrapover front with a narrow tie belt at the waist. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.

Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with semi-shiny panels down the sides. High waist with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Calf-length dress in a cupro and viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long, fitted jumper in a textured knit with a slight sheen. Long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Boots in cotton twill with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and chunky block heels. Lining and moulded insoles in cotton canvas. Heel 7 cm.
Short, tiered skirt in a patterned weave with wide smocking at the waist.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and a seam down the front.
Knee-length skirt in imitation leather with a slit at the front, decorative lacing at the top and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Cap-sleeved top in airy slub jersey with a low-cut, gently draped wrapover back.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Top in soft jersey with a round neck and short sleeves.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, a yoke at the front and long sleeves.
Fully lined, glittery bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Thin, patterned socks with a short shaft.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with tiers to the hem. Jersey lining.
Suspender belt in lace with narrow, concealed, scallop-edged elastication at the top and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bracelets in various sizes and designs in imitation leather with an embossed snakeskin pattern. Width 2 cm and 5 cm. Inner diameter approx. 6 cm.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Fitted top in fast-drying, functional fabric with short sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke.
Long-sleeved lace blouse with lacing at the back, a frill trim over the shoulders and at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight legs with creases that taper to the hem. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.

Blouse in an airy, textured chiffon weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Reversible, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in satin with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and narrow cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Lightweight parka woven in a textured cotton blend. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring and foldover front edge and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hem. Mesh lining.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
Sunhat in a patterned cotton weave with ears on top and ties under the chin. Cotton lining.
Derby shoes in leather with pointed toes and open lacing. Leather linings and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.

Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button and zip fly. Elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed drawstring, side pockets, a zipped welt back pocket, and short slits in the sides of the hems.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim legs.

Short, padded parka in woven fabric with a sheen, with a lined hood with a wide faux fur trim, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and handwarmer pockets with a flap and press-stud. Concealed drawstring at the waist and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Imitation leather sandals with butterfly appliqués at the front and a strap with a hook and loop fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with short sleeves. Elastication and a drawstring at the sides for a gently draped effect.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a frill trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Set with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with print motifs on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif.
Fitted dress in soft jersey containing glittery threads, a V-neck at the back and a tie at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Double-breasted coat in a sturdy wool weave with peak lapels with a buttonhole, buttons at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Flap side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Ankle-length joggers in a textured cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Matt, opaque tights with extra room for a growing tummy. 200 denier.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Short dress in an airy, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell and viscose blend. Double layer at the top and a halter neck with wide straps that can be tied in various ways. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a seam with a draped section under the bust and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
